member.name: T:System.Windows.Ria.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService
member.summary: Service that is responsible for authenticating, loading, and saving the current user.
member.remarks:
This abstract base exposes Login, Logout, LoadUser, and SaveUser as asynchronous operations. It also provides a number of properties that can be bound to including and .
Concrete implementations will have a much different view of this class through a number of abstract template methods. These methods follow the async result pattern and are presented in Begin/End pairs for each operation. Optionally, cancel methods for each operation can also be implemented.

member.summary: Executes an asynchronous query operation.

Optional name/value collection of parameters to the method.
Optional query to be sent to the server for composition over the method results.
True if the query has side-effects, false otherwise.

member.name: T:System.Web.Ria.Data.DomainServiceException
member.summary: This exception indicates that an unrecoverable error has occurred during the execution of a domain operation. When this exception is thrown by the domain service, the processing of the domain operations stops. This exception is propagated back to the client regardless of the server CustomErrors configuration. This exception can be used by server code to report non-sensitive error information back to the client.

member.summary: The cached instance is not changed and the newly read instance is discarded.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Ria.Data.MergeOption.KeepChanges
member.summary: Values from the newly read instance are merged into the cached instance for property values that are unmodified. No changes are lost in this merge.

member.summary: All members of the cached instance are overwritten with current values from the newly read instance, regardless of whether they have been modified.
